mapper.insert:
select replace(uuid(), '-', '') as id from dual
insert into cy_pingan_case (id_pingan_case, customer_name, customer_sex, hand_other, entrust_batch, outsourcing_district, b_l_k, long_committee_number, acode_date) values (#{id}, #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{handOther,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entrustBatch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outsourcingDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BLK,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longCommitteeNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acodeDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
